name: Quote Slide
description:
Quote Slide is a challenging word puzzle featuring funny and thought-provoking quotes from a wide range of speakers.

You’re given horizontal and vertical letter clues, and it’s up to you to arrange them to spell out the quote!

And there’s more! Once you’ve solved the quote, you’ll be challenged to unscramble letters from the puzzle to answer a riddle related to the quote.

If you’re stuck, there are three power-ups you can use to help you along: hints, auto-completes, and inspectors!

Visit every day for the FREE daily puzzle!

You’ll earn coins with every puzzle you solve, and you can use them to purchase more puzzles, theme packs, and power-ups.

If you like a quote, you can visit our Facebook app to share it on your wall, find out more information about the speaker, or see more quotes by the same person.

Brought to you by Wiggles 3D, the makers of Don’t Quote Me, Lexigo, and Eye Know.
